originContent: 体积小、使用简单、支持 macOS 和 Windows 系统。
translatedContent: Small size, easy to use, supports macOS and Windows systems.
1. Added a download button on the Video Channel homepage

originContent: 2、增加 `uninstall` 命令，可卸载本工具安装的根证书
translatedContent: 2. Added the `uninstall` command to uninstall the root certificate installed by this tool

originContent: 3、修复打开长视频页面空白的问题
translatedContent: 3. Fixed the issue of blank page when opening long video pages

originContent: 1、修复了微信新版本没有下载按钮的问题
translatedContent: 1. Fixed the issue of no download button in the new version of WeChat

originContent: 1、优化下载时的「进度」展示效果
translatedContent: 1. Optimized the "progress" display effect during download

originContent: 2、增加 `download` 命令，可在终端下载视频及解密。超过 1G 的视频建议使用该方式下载
translatedContent: 2. Added the `download` command to download and decrypt videos via terminal. It is recommended to use this method for videos over 1GB

originContent: ./wx_video_download_xx download --url "视频地址" --key 解密key --filename "文件名"
translatedContent: ./wx_video_download_xx download --url "视频地址" --key 解密key --filename "文件名"

originContent: # 视频地址、文件名参数需要双引号包裹。解密key不用双引号
translatedContent: # 视频地址、文件名参数需要双引号包裹。解密key不用双引号

originContent: # 将会下载视频到 `Downloads` 目录，然后解密
translatedContent: # 将会下载视频到 `Downloads` 目录，然后解密
3. Added a "Print Download Command" button in the "More" menu of the video account

originContent: 3、视频号「更多」菜单中增加「打印下载命令」按钮

translatedContent: 4. Fixed the issue where some error messages during certificate installation were not in Chinese

originContent: 4、修复安装证书时有些错误提示不是中文的问题

translatedContent: 1. Fixed the problem of being unable to download images and videos

originContent: 1、修复无法下载图片视频的问题

translatedContent: 1. Fixed the issue where downloaded videos could not be played

originContent: 1、修复了下载的视频无法播放的问题

translatedContent: 1. Fixed the issue of being unable to download videos

originContent: 1、修复了无法下载视频的问题

translatedContent: 1. Fixed the inconsistency in download button styles

originContent: 1、修复了 下载按钮样式不一致的问题

translatedContent: 2. Fixed the issue where clicking the More button did not display the more menu

originContent: 2、修复了 更多按钮点击不显示更多菜单的问题

translatedContent: 3. Added a prompt to run as administrator when Windows startup fails

originContent: 3、增加了 windows 启动失败时提示是否以管理员身份运行

translatedContent: 1. Display download progress in the console; when progress cannot be obtained, show the number of bytes downloaded

originContent: 1、在控制台显示下载进度，当获取不到进度时显示已下载的字节数

translatedContent: 2. Added cover image download in the "More" menu

originContent: 2、在「更多」菜单中增加封面图片下载

translatedContent: 3. Automatically detect the current network device and proxy

originContent: 3、自动检测当前网络设备并代理

translatedContent: 4. Support command line parameters to specify the network device to proxy and the port number used by the program

originContent: 4、支持命令行参数指定要代理的网络设备和程序使用的端口号
> 一般情况下无需手动指定设备与端口号，直接 ./wx_video_download_xxx 即可
translatedContent: > In general, there is no need to manually specify the device and port number; just run ./wx_video_download_xxx directly.

originContent: 在微信 Version 3.8.9 (28564) 测试可用
translatedContent: Tested and available on WeChat Version 3.8.9 (28564)

originContent: 此时会提示文件不能打开，需要到系统设置中允许，然后重新执行 `sudo ./wx_video_download_darwin_xxx`。
translatedContent: At this time, a prompt will appear indicating that the file cannot be opened, requiring you to allow it in the system settings, then re-execute `sudo ./wx_video_download_darwin_xxx`.

originContent: 在安装证书的过程中会申请权限，同意即可。后续打开无需使用 `sudo`，只需要双击运行
translatedContent: During the certificate installation process, permission will be requested; just agree. Afterwards, you do not need to use `sudo` to open it, just double-click to run.

originContent: 关闭 `macOS` 终端时请使用 `Command + c` 的方式，否则可能会出现系统代理未取消，导致网络无法访问的问题
translatedContent: When closing the `macOS` terminal, please use `Command + c`, otherwise the system proxy may not be canceled, causing network access issues.

originContent: > 当出现网络无法访问时请检查系统代理并手动取消即可。
translatedContent: > If network access is unavailable, please check the system proxy and manually cancel it.

originContent: 1、修复了 非首次打开的视频，下载下来都无法播放的问题
translatedContent: 1. Fixed the issue where videos downloaded on non-first openings could not be played.

originContent: 现在点击页面上「更多推荐」视频，下载下来的视频可以正常打开播放了。
translatedContent: Now, when clicking on the "More Recommendations" videos on the page, the downloaded videos can be opened and played normally.

originContent: 当出现「解密失败，停止下载」的提示，关闭全部视频页面、窗口。重新打开，就可以下载。
translatedContent: When the prompt "Decryption failed, download stopped" appears, close all video pages and windows. Reopen, and you can download again.

originContent: 1、 支持下载不同质量的视频
translatedContent: 1. Support for downloading videos of different qualities.

originContent: 2、 修复了下载的视频无法拖动进度条的问题
translatedContent: 2. Fixed the issue where downloaded videos could not have their progress bar dragged.

originContent: 3、 修复了长视频内容进度未加载就下载，导致视频无法播放或不完整的问题
translatedContent: 3. Fixed the issue where downloading started before the long video content progress loaded, causing the video to be unplayable or incomplete.

originContent: 4、 修复了某些视频误判断为图片导致无法下载的问题
translatedContent: 4. Fixed the issue where some videos were mistakenly identified as images, preventing download.

originContent: 5、 修复了直播间一直加载中的问题
translatedContent: 5. Fixed the issue where live rooms kept loading indefinitely.

originContent: 关于不同质量的视频，详情见下方使用说明。
translatedContent: For details on videos of different qualities, see the usage instructions below.

originContent: 在「更多」下拉菜单增加「下载视频」按钮，兼容不同详情页布局不同导致没有下载按钮的问题。
translatedContent: Added a "Download Video" button under the "More" dropdown menu to address the issue of missing download buttons due to different detail page layouts.

originContent: 现在无需手动下载证书并安装了。
translatedContent: No need to manually download and install the certificate anymore.

originContent: 修复了下载时提示找不到 `lib/jszip.min.js` 的问题。
translatedContent: Fixed the issue where `lib/jszip.min.js` could not be found during download.

originContent: 又遇到之前无法在页面下载的问题，这次改成了下载压缩包，视频在压缩包内的形式。
translatedContent: Encountered the previous issue of being unable to download from the page again; this time changed to downloading a compressed package with the video inside.

originContent: 目前是可行的，但无法保证之后仍然可行。
translatedContent: Currently works, but cannot guarantee it will continue to do so.

originContent: 建议使用 [WechatVideoSniffer2.0](https://github.com/kanadeblisst00/WechatVideoSniffer2.0) 稳定性更高。
translatedContent: It is recommended to use [WechatVideoSniffer2.0](https://github.com/kanadeblisst00/WechatVideoSniffer2.0) for higher stability.

originContent: 当视频号内容是多张图片时，也会出现下载按钮。点击将会下载一个包含了全部图片的压缩包。
translatedContent: When the video account content consists of multiple images, a download button will also appear. Clicking it will download a compressed package containing all the images.

originContent: 当视频被删除时没有正确地显示「被删除」而是一直处于加载中状态。
translatedContent: When a video is deleted, it did not correctly display "Deleted" and remained in the loading state.

originContent: 下载按钮修改成和其他操作按钮相同的样式。
translatedContent: The download button style was changed to match other operation buttons.

originContent: 前一个版本又下载不了，改回在页面直接下载又正常了，是和微信客户端版本有关吗，对这块不了解。
translatedContent: The previous version failed to download again; reverting to direct page downloads works fine, possibly related to the WeChat client version, which I do not understand well.

originContent: 如果 241016 这个版本用不了，可以试试其他版本。
translatedContent: If version 241016 does not work, you can try other versions.

originContent: 我目前微信客户端版本是 `Weixin 3.9.12.17`，可以正常下载的。
translatedContent: My current WeChat client version is `Weixin 3.9.12.17` and it downloads normally.

originContent: 应该是视频号又改版了，不能直接在页面下载了。改成点击下载按钮复制视频链接到粘贴板，然后到谷歌或其他浏览器打开下载。
translatedContent: It seems the video account was redesigned again, preventing direct downloads from the page. Changed to copying the video link to the clipboard when clicking the download button, then open it in Chrome or another browser to download.

originContent: 另外测试了很多视频都可以直接下载，没有加密了。所以如果有加密视频，新版本可能会下载失败。
translatedContent: Also tested many videos that can be downloaded directly without encryption. So if there are encrypted videos, the new version may fail to download.

originContent: > 在页面直接下载，理论上还是能实现，实现上要麻烦许多，后面再研究。
translatedContent: > Direct downloads on the page are theoretically still possible but much more complicated to implement. Will research this later.

originContent: 下载[二进制文件](https://github.com/ltaoo/wx_channels_download/releases)，**以管理员身份运行**，首次打开会自动安装证书，然后启动服务。
translatedContent: Download the [binary file](https://github.com/ltaoo/wx_channels_download/releases), **run as administrator**, the first time you open it, it will automatically install the certificate and then start the service.

originContent: 当终端提示「服务已正确启动」就说明可以使用了。
translatedContent: When the terminal prompts "Service started successfully," it means it is ready to use.

originContent: > 已安装证书会跳过安装证书步骤。
translatedContent: > If the certificate is already installed, the installation step will be skipped.

originContent: 打开微信 PC 端，点击需要下载的视频，在视频下方的操作按钮一栏，会多出一个下载按钮，如下所示
translatedContent: Open the WeChat PC client, click on the video you want to download, and a download button will appear in the row of operation buttons below the video, as shown below

originContent:
> 如果没有，可以看看「更多」这里是否有「下载视频」按钮。
> ![下载按钮2](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ltaoo/wx_channels_download/main/assets/screenshot10.png)
translatedContent:
> If not, check if there is a "Download Video" button under "More".
> ![Download Button 2](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ltaoo/wx_channels_download/main/assets/screenshot10.png)

originContent: 等待视频开始播放，然后暂停视频，点击下载按扭即可下载视频。下载成功后，会在上方显示已下载的文件，下载文件名最后面会标志该视频质量。
translatedContent: Wait for the video to start playing, then pause the video, and click the download button to download the video. After a successful download, the downloaded file will be displayed above, and the file name will indicate the video quality.

originContent: 默认会下载下拉菜单中第一个质量视频。点开更多，可以下载其他质量的视频，包括原始视频。
translatedContent: By default, the first quality video in the dropdown menu will be downloaded. Click "More" to download videos of other qualities, including the original video.

originContent: 不同视频这里显示的选项是不同的，没有找到对 xWT111 具体的说明，属于什么分辨率、尺寸多大等等。
translatedContent: Different videos show different options here. There is no specific explanation for xWT111, such as what resolution or size it corresponds to.

originContent: 经过测试，如果原始视频有 104MB，这里尺寸最大的是 xWT111 为 17MB，最小的是 xWT98 为 7MB。
translatedContent: After testing, if the original video is 104MB, the largest size here is xWT111 at 17MB, and the smallest is xWT98 at 7MB.

originContent: 1、服务启动了，打开视频详情后一直在加载，而且终端没有日志信息。
translatedContent: 1. The service is started, but after opening the video details, it keeps loading and there is no log information in the terminal.

originContent: 尝试在终端 `Ctrl+C`，按一次即可。
translatedContent: Try pressing `Ctrl+C` once in the terminal.

originContent: 关闭全部视频页面、窗口。重新打开，就可以下载。
translatedContent: Close all video pages and windows. Reopen, then you can download.

originContent: 先以 管理员身份 启动终端，然后 `go run main.go` 即可。
translatedContent: First start the terminal as an administrator, then run `go run main.go`.

originContent: 打包后可以使用 `upx` 压缩，体积可以从 17MB 压缩到 5MB。
translatedContent: After packaging, `upx` can be used for compression, reducing the size from 17MB to 5MB.

originContent: CGO_ENABLED=1 GOOS=darwin SDKROOT=$(xcrun --sdk macosx --show-sdk-path) go build -trimpath -ldflags="-s -w" -o wx_video_download
translatedContent: CGO_ENABLED=1 GOOS=darwin SDKROOT=$(xcrun --sdk macosx --show-sdk-path) go build -trimpath -ldflags="-s -w" -o wx_video_download

originContent: CGO_ENABLED=1 GOOS=darwin GOARCH=amd64 SDKROOT=$(xcrun --sdk macosx --show-sdk-path) go build -trimpath -ldflags="-s -w" -o wx_video_download
translatedContent: CGO_ENABLED=1 GOOS=darwin GOARCH=amd64 SDKROOT=$(xcrun --sdk macosx --show-sdk-path) go build -trimpath -ldflags="-s -w" -o wx_video_download

originContent: 此程序大部分参考自以下项目代码
translatedContent: 此程序大部分参考自以下项目代码

originContent: 此程序的核心实现依赖以下库
translatedContent: 此程序的核心实现依赖以下库

originContent: 如果我的项目对你有所帮助，可以请我喝杯咖啡 ☕️
translatedContent: 如果我的项目对你有所帮助，可以请我喝杯咖啡 ☕️

originContent: 仅用于技术交流学习和研究的目的
translatedContent: 仅用于技术交流学习和研究的目的

originContent: 请遵守法律法规,请勿用作任何非法用途
translatedContent: 请遵守法律法规,请勿用作任何非法用途

originContent: 否则造成一切后果自负
translatedContent: 否则造成一切后果自负

originContent: 若您下载并使用即视为您知晓并同意
translatedContent: 若您下载并使用即视为您知晓并同意
